channel.title: INartsAndEnt
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INartsAndEnt, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CinemaCon 2025 Live Blog: Day 4
item.description: Follow along with SR for live updates on CinemaCon, the annual movie theater industry convention. The final day is ending with Paramount and Disney!

item.title: Lucius Malfoy Star Reveals Which Hogwarts House He Belongs To In Real Life, & The Response Will Have Harry Potter Fans Giddy
item.description: Lucius Malfoy actor Jason Isaacs reveals which Hogwarts house he belongs to in real life, and Harry Potter fans will be pleased with his answer.

item.title: 10 Incredible Movie Scores From The Last Decade That Don't Get Enough Love
item.description: From ambitious blockbusters to dark thrillers, the right soundtrack can elevate a film and become part of the story, yet many can be underappreciated.

item.title: Val Kilmer Wasn't a Diva, He Was a Perfectionist, Says Danny Trejo
item.description: Val Kilmer had been dogged by rumors that he was a Hollywood diva and a pain to work with ... but one costar and friend tells TMZ that's a total crock...
